metadata.synopsis: One-linerSteel Watchers in the Streets minibooster.At Basilisk GateOne of civilians dialogs - NOTE Please rename to Eefa Barlow.

0.speaker: Eefa Barlow
0.text: I didn't like those metal contraptions, but I like it even less that they've all collapsed. Can't depend on anything or anyone these days.

1.speaker: Eefa Barlow
1.text: Used to think those things were going to make me feel safer. Not anymore.
